Name: XANARTHRAXIA
About the game: Stalwart knight, align yourself for battle! Synchronize the energetic patterns within XANARTHRAXIA's ancient glyphs and cleanse the land of evil in this bite-sized, casually competitive, RPG clicker. XANARTHRAXIA, at its core, is a game about self-discovery, self-discipline. and personal accomplishment. Ultimately, the greatest enemy you'll face throughout the entire experience is yourself. At a certain point it becomes a personal challenge that you will want to finish simply because you believe you can. Finishing will require your full attention, hand-eye coordination, personal determination, timing, focus, quick reaction speed and maybe a cup of coffee to perk you up. The only thing that can hold you back are your own self-doubts, personal fears and limiting beliefs. Overcome yourself, overcome XANARTHRAXIA. String together attack combos by correctly matching shapes before the enemy has a chance to react. Fight against an endless army of procedural enemy types including Slimes, Zombies, Dragons and Ogres. 6 different procedural worlds that will test your cognitive dexterity. Choose from different run-altering perks like extra armor, damage, or precious time bonuses. Power up your combo meter with successful strikes to unleash a devastating super attack. Recover health points by clearing every tile in play. Get as far as you can and deposit your gold to see how you rank on the Steam Leaderboards. Handcrafted pixel art with a retro Gameboy/Nokia feel. Original 8-bit chip tune soundtrack. Simple, single button gameplay using either the mouse or the numpad. No Level Cap! Grind endlessly with no restrictions. Compete competitively worldwide on the Steam Leaderboards. Compete casually locally with Steam Cloud stats. 5 actually obtainable Steam achievements for achievement hunters. New unlockable Hardcore mode for the most dedicated knights. Fully Integrated indie developer support!
